skillTree.localised_description: A mystical horse of fey power, never slowed by its heavy barding. The Shadow Steed allows the Green Knight to move swiftly and silently across the battlefield.

related_attributes.bullet_text:
When charging into an enemy unit:
	  Charge Bonus duration is doubled.
	 Enemy units take a  Leadership penalty as if they have been attacked in the flank.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.
Witnessing friendly units with the Peasant Attribute rout will not affect this unit's leadership.
Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.
This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

skillTree.localised_description: The legendary sword of the Green Knight, infused with ancient magic and glowing with a strange light. It is said to be capable of destroying enemies in their droves.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee.

related_attributes.bullet_text: Entities with this attribute double their charge bonus when attacking the rear or flank of an entity.

skillTree.localised_description: A sacred goblet etched on the Green Knight's breastplate, symbolizing his connection to the Lady of the Lake. It is adorned with golden tracery and an oak-leaf halo.
The Green Knight's ornate plate armor, tinged the greenish-grey of weather-beaten rock, is a testament to his ancient power and connection to the land.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit takes no penalties when flanked.
When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any large attacker.
When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.

skillTree.localised_description: The Green Knight's unwavering devotion to the Lady of the Lake imbues his armies with her divine grace. Her blessings bolster the spirits of his warriors and shield them from the darkest magics.

As the embodiment of Bretonnia's ancient spirit, the Green Knight's presence fortifies the hearts of his people. His warriors stand resolute, their defenses unyielding, especially when protecting their sacred homeland.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +6 (when fighting in own or allied territory)
	(Hero's army)

Melee defence: +12 (when fighting in own or allied territory)
	(Hero's army)

Melee defence: +18 (when fighting in own or allied territory)
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The Green Knight's timeless knowledge of Bretonnia's hidden paths and ancient secrets allows his armies to traverse the land with unmatched swiftness and stealth, striking from the shadows when least expected.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +20% (when in own or allied territory)
	(Hero's army)

Ambush success chance: +40% (when in own or allied territory)
	(Hero's army)

Ambush success chance: +60% (when in own or allied territory)
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The Green Knight's otherworldly nature grants his armies an unyielding endurance, allowing them to withstand the harshest conditions and march tirelessly through even the most treacherous lands.

effects.description:
Attrition: +5% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Hero's army)

Attrition: +10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Hero's army)

Attrition: +15% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The Green Knight's quest for the Holy Grail ignites a holy zeal within his followers, inspiring them to charge into battle with unmatched fervor, especially against the forces of darkness and chaos.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +3% (when fighting against the forces of evil)
	(Hero's army)

Weapon strength: +6% (when fighting against the forces of evil)
	(Hero's army)

Weapon strength: +10% (when fighting against the forces of evil)
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The Green Knight's deep connection to Bretonnia fosters unwavering loyalty among its people. His presence strengthens the bonds of fealty, making rebellions rare and ensuring that the land remains united under his banner.

effects.description:
Recruit rank: +2 for all units
	(all armies factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Full-plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of the Green Knight ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

effects.description:
Enemy leadership: -2
	(enemy armies in local province)

Enemy leadership: -4
	(enemy armies in local province)

Enemy leadership: -6
	(enemy armies in local province)

skillTree.localised_description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The bigger they are, the harder they fall.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: When everything else fails, there is always studying the blade. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
Wielding the shield is better than returning on it. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
When everything else fails, there is always studying the blade. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
Wielding the shield is better than returning on it. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 20%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 30%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.
